name: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.4
summary: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.4 is an album released by Media Factory at the price of ￥1260 on January 30, 2013. This CD includes two new songs by Haruka Amami, a solo version of the Puchimasu! theme La♪La♪La♪Wonderland, and an original drama track. Also included is an off vocal version of the first song featured on the CD.
info:
• 艺术家: 天海春香&はるかさん(CV:中村繪里子)
  • 版本特性: Single / Maxi
  • 发售日期: 2013-01-30
  • 价格: ￥ 1,260
  • 录音: メディアファクトリー
  • 发行商: メディアファクトリー
